website_summaries.verdict: A popular, vegan-friendly bar with plenty of protein-rich cashew nuts for chewiness, that is very sweet.
pros: Fans like this bar’s natural blueberry taste, with no medicinal overtones
Plenty of cashew nuts throughout to keep the bar chewy despite its high fruit content
Fits well with stricter diets including vegan, soy-free, and elimination diets
cons: Way too sweet and rich for some palates

customer_reviews.title: Bars were expired!
customer_reviews.text: Bars were expired!!!! I made this purchase in mid March. Upon opening the box & checking the Best By date I see that it was LAST OCTOBER!!! Very disappointed! Forgot to mention that there was an "As Is" sticker on the box! WTH!
customer_reviews.author: Msjen

customer_reviews.title: What happened?!?!!
customer_reviews.text: We used to *love* Blueberry Muffin Larabars. It's the only thing I put on auto-ship because we could not keep them in the house. The shipping has cone down hill over time (crushed boxes and mashed larabars) but this last order is TERRIBLE. They do not taste *anything* like Blueberry Muffin. I could not even bring myself to eat the entire thing, and now wish I stopped earlier because I feel sick to my stomach. What on earth happened? The wrapper appears to be the same - same ingredients... but there's on way. I doubt a single blueberry went into the production of the bar I regret eating half of.... I just canceled auto-ship.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bars in this box had mold in it. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantine

customer_reviews.title: Best variety by far, but open box was unsettling.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars - by far my favorite flavor is the Blueberry Muffin. I want to give this 5 stars on that alone, but this is also about the seller... On this order, my box had definitely already been opened and resealed with clear packing tape. All of the bars were accounted for and look untampered with, but the open box when purchasing a new FOOD product was unsettling.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Not rotating stock correctly, getting short expiration window.
customer_reviews.text: Received via subscribe and save, with an expiration date next month (Nov 2019). Considering I have a surplus already from subscribe and save, there is no way I will consume these before they expire. Odd thing is, I have some others of this identical item I received months ago that dont expire until Feb 2020. Someone is not rotating their stock correctly. Same thing is happening to me with other subscribe and save items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I will not be getting these again. I really wanted to love them but they were not good. They say blueberry muffin but they do not taste anything like it. They remind me of breastfeeding bars. Like you have to eat them because you bought them but I will not eat them again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Box smelled like bug spray
customer_reviews.text: Even after all the reviews about mold, I decided to try anyway ... I thought they sounded good. I received them Sat, and as soon as I opened the box, a strong scent hit me that smelled like bug spray. I cautiously opened one of the bars, and at least I didn’t see mold. The bar itself didn’t seem to have the bad smell, so I’m thinking maybe the plant was having exterminating done, and spray got on the outer box. Whatever happened, it’s not inviting to eat something that has bad odor.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this flavor, and this is the cheapest I’ve seen it, even cheaper than the “case discount” at WFoods. I was a little concerned at first when I saw the condition of the box that was bent on the side and had been taped shut. But after careful inspection of all the bars, nothing is broken or bent. I purchased in the beginning of July 2020, and all the bars have an expiration date of November 2020.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, but delivery has me worried
customer_reviews.text: The day this was delivered we were home all day. Sunday I remembered it should have been delivered and ran to the porch - no package. The thought occurred to me to check the mailbox. It was stuffed in there. I love this product, but do not love that the app states it was "hand delivered to residents." It was not. Not to mention, the package was taped together and rough looking. I am not sure if they came that way or the act of stuffing them in the mailbox created the damage. I am not sure if I can eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Worst flavor
customer_reviews.text: The cherry and apple ones were pretty good. I haven't really disliked any Larabar before but these are just dry and flavorless.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money :( taste bad, gave me a headache, and made me bloated
customer_reviews.text: 1 extra star because they came on time, but that’s it. I ate two of these, now I have a headache and am sooo bloated!!! I can barely focus at work right now and am sluggish. I thought this would be fine since the sugar is natural, but nope! These are soooo hard for me to digest and make me feel terrible after eating. I think I am just sensitive to sugar, so I DO NOT RECOMMEND IF YOU HAVE A SUGAR SENSITIVITY OR SENSITIVE STOMACH. The blueberry muffin doesn’t even taste good! Now I have to throw them out. Waste of money sadly :(
customer_reviews.author: mep mcs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Flavor not good.
customer_reviews.text: This flavor of Larabar is NOT GOOD. It just has an unpleasant taste. Not enjoyable at all. I know everyone's taste buds are different and I'm NOT a picky eater. But these are not good which is disappointing because I've had other flavors of Larabars and they were great! Guess I'll just have to try another flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Blueberry Muffin bars were not as good as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I love that Larabars have very simple wholesome ingredients, so, for that reason I will eat the bars and be happy. However, the Blueberry Muffin bars do not taste good in my opinion (which actually makes them a good snack food to keep in my desk because I don't have any desire to munch on them unless I'm starving). The consistency is just on the solid side of gooey, this coupled with an underwhelming flavor, makes these bars pretty unappetizing. I'm not ready to give up on Larabar's though, I just think I need to try some of the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality. Rip off for price.
customer_reviews.text: I had read multiple reviews of the box arriving damaged, and moldy bars. The package arrived damaged, taped up, but the bars were all wrapped for individual sale. Clearly it’s a display box to be sold in stores. The bars have a very slight stale taste to them, but nothing really “off”. For what you’d pay for in a Target or Walmart, these are poor in quality. Most likely not to make the same purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: caleb cooke

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before without issue but the latest order of two boxes was spoiled. The bars smell funny, are rock hard and sour. The expiration date is not up until two more months but they have clearly reached a shelf life. I will be contacting the seller for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: chris voorhies

customer_reviews.title: LOVE The bars, but expiration date too close
customer_reviews.text: Today is feb 13, expiration date on this 16 pack is April 27. I eat a lot of larabär bars so I’ll probably consume them before they expire but I think they should not send out bulk packs with the expiration date being 2 months away. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Off flavor
customer_reviews.text: First one I ate had an off-flavor like bacon. The second one I ate also had a slightly off taste. I think I eventually got used to the taste and was able to eat them all. I like the ingredients and think I just got a bad batch perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Mic Mac

customer_reviews.title: Box came opened...
customer_reviews.text: Box came opened with a single peice of tape to hold down the lid and bars were missing. It's irritating to not get the amount you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: John Snow

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase has made me addicted to Larabars. The product itself is just a good quality product. Such simple ingredients and good for anyone's dietary needs. Great healthy snack bar for on the go. I take one with me everyday to get through the day. The blueberry muffin larabar is by far one of my favorite flavors, though they are all good. I use the subscribe and save option which is the cheapest bulk option for larabars I have found. Packaging of the individual 16 count boxes aren't perfect, but who cares when the bars aren't compromised and are still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: tferd

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me...
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are only 5 ingredients! Turns out though, if chocolate isn’t one of those 5, it’s probably not for me. I had to choke one down because I hate to waste, then the goal was to find someone to give them to who actually thought they were worth eating... Lesson learned - I’ll stick to my chocolate chip peanut butter flavor!
customer_reviews.author: ap2008

customer_reviews.title: Slimey!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these bars nearly every month, but my recent order was extremely slimey and oily. Normally the nuts have a little oil, but these were drenched and oil I could barely eat it without gagging. I am disappointed because I am a regular larabar lover, and blueberry is my favorite flavor :/ I hope there is someway I can refund or complain.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: not reminiscent of a blueberry muffin
customer_reviews.text: These are not moving... appears no one in the house likes them. I found them to have a mealy texture, and a kind of gross undertaste... certainly not reminiscent of a blueberry muffin.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: I love larabars, great snacks
customer_reviews.text: I love many flavors of larabars. With all of the foods we eat having so much stuff in them, it is hard to believe that a product with so few ingredients would actually be good. But I really like these, they make for a great mid day snack at work.
customer_reviews.author: R. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Finely chopped nuts a plus for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love these for one big reason. Small chopped up nuts not big tooth crackers like some of the choices they have. Flavor is very good. Expiration is Dec. they will be long gone before then.
customer_reviews.author: RVing Mojo's

customer_reviews.title: The second bite wonder bar!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First bite, meh. By the second bite all these soft juicy flavors are exploding in your mouth. I love that it gummy bear soft to chew. My favorite is the Blueberry Muffin. Jennifer
customer_reviews.author: jenthemom

customer_reviews.title: Real Food for Busy Folks
customer_reviews.text: I love having these available when I don't have time to stop working, but would like to eat real food. Not as good as a real meal, of course, but it's much better than a candy bar, a granola bar, or even a Cliff bar for something quick, nutritious, and trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: kalidassa

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 &5 year old love these and we get them as a subscription. I love that they aren’t packed with random ingredients like most other options. 5 ingredients. Minimal chemical junk. I’m a happy mama!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Did these get dropped on the floor at the warehouse?!
customer_reviews.text: Lara bars are great. My order came in pretty rough shape. The box was covered in tape and once I opened the box the wrappers of the bars are greasy or something. Clearly broken open or something. It is a little concerning that people weren't more careful with food items
customer_reviews.author: HotDogWaterQueen

customer_reviews.title: Stale, old, oily, not edible.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived stale and with an oily coat on them, They smelled weird and tasted even worse. The texture from being old was horrible and I had to spit it out
customer_reviews.author: LANE JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Berry Good
customer_reviews.text: I like em. They fluctuate in price alot its crazy. They should just be like 10 bucks for 20 of em. But yeah theyre not delicious but they make a poop and are fairly healthy
customer_reviews.author: H Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Never the blueberry again
customer_reviews.text: Quality in these blueberry Larabars has gone way down. I've given them to make tries and always get packages that are opened.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Wills

customer_reviews.title: Yesssss
customer_reviews.text: These are tasty and filling and I love eating them knowing they are gluten free, safe for me to eat with IBS and a colon disease and can be eaten at home or on the go. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: MinneapolisVinylRind

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Best price we found for these is definitely on Amazon. We love almost all of the Larabars. They are great for a healthier snack on the go and even our two-year-old asks for them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid stale Larabars
customer_reviews.text: The Larabars I've tasted from nearby brick-and-morter retailers have been great: moist and tasty, a pleasure. The two boxes I bought from Amazon are neither -- they are old stock, stale, and almost tasteless. In fact, there's little difference in taste between the two bars! Amazon should not be charging full retail for stale foods. I'd recommend buyers stay away from these.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W Login

customer_reviews.title: Love the Flavor
customer_reviews.text: These have become my favorite snack bar. I love the flavor and have already ordered them a few times. I will keep ordering these.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Only 14 bars!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the package today and it only had 14 bars in the package! I love these bars but majorly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Oceans

customer_reviews.title: Larabars from amazon not always freshest
customer_reviews.text: Writing a review because time after time the larabars that come from Amazon have short expiration dates. A box bought at my local store typically has 6 months or so while the last box I got from amazon expires in just over 30 days. Possibly not an issue for some but my experience has been that they taste older than the local ones as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great Whole30 snack
customer_reviews.text: Most stores in our area only have the 5 count boxes, so the 16 count boxes are great. We always get these bars for Whole30 and they’re very filling. Make sure you double check the ingredients, because a few of the flavors have chocolate and are not Whole30 approved-most are though.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M

customer_reviews.title: Hey vegans. Hey everybody.
customer_reviews.text: Never leave the house without a Larabar. I've been buying these for years. I have a couple in my car, some at work and sometimes I keep one in my purse. They have saved my from making one hundred unhealthy mistakes. I have to say, the box I bought on Amazon were the freshest bars I ever had.Truth.
customer_reviews.author: Traci B

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t appreciate open box
customer_reviews.text: Because you sent me an open box. It had been re-taped and was missing two bars. That was not OK.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Vuillemot

customer_reviews.title: Love the bars, but these were MOLDY!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars! Got them from a local store and loved them so much that I decided to buy a case (16 bars) online. Opened my first bar and took a bite, then realized it was moldy...disgusting!!! The expiration date is June 2018. I received them March 2018. So disappointed! I hope the other two flavors I purchased are not in the same condition. Sending the blueberry bars back for a refund! Giving one star because of the mold, otherwise think the bars are great!
customer_reviews.author: KAtie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like plastic
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of Larabars generally, but this flavor tastes like plastic. Not sure if they were old or if they always taste this bad, but I recommend you try other flavors instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Aurora

customer_reviews.title: We like Larabars But Watch Out for Moldy Blueberry
customer_reviews.text: Love the Peanut Butter Chocolate, those have never let me down. We ordered the Blueberry for many months before noticing they started having a bit of a sour taste. I was eating them somewhat absent-mindedly in the car on the way to work, but my husband noticed that some of them had mold on the ends. After opening and checking a few more bars, we found mold on all of them so ended up throwing away half the box and not ordering again. Too bad. We are big Larabar fans and are now ordering the Carrot Cake instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavors are blueberry muffin
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely delicious. My favorite flavors are blueberry muffin, carrot cake, cashew cookie. I keep these in the house as they are filling, great tasting and healthy. My 1 year old can eat several flavors without trouble (some have whole nuts). Looking forward to trying some more flavors. My kids love the peanut butter cookie. Flavors I'm not a fan of are pecan pie, cappuccino (this one is awful), apple pie.
customer_reviews.author: Wind and Rain Lovin Mama

customer_reviews.title: Chewy Date Bar
customer_reviews.text: 3.5* Tastes like dates and nuts in a chewy payload. There is no blueberry or muffin taste at all. Their other bars actually taste like what they say (like carrot cake, with bits of carrots). Still, a good way to get decent energy that is not junk food.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Ted

customer_reviews.title: go to breakfast bar
customer_reviews.text: real ingredients, the best of their flavors, filling and not too sweet. love these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cieslak

customer_reviews.title: It serves as good breakfast if you are rushing to work.
customer_reviews.text: Great snacks, good texture, good ingredients and moist. The best for me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Fema

customer_reviews.title: These are good for people on restrictive diets
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic..my dad loves them and can have these on his restrictive diet..
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Good and good for me
customer_reviews.text: I've bought my second box because they are good and good for and I'm not think only one in my house that thinks so, hence the second box. Good with a cup of coffee in the morning and a good snack.
customer_reviews.author: Ralyn Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Taste good and easy to bring along anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Lisa VanDerVeen

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: The package was torn and the box of bars inside was also torn. The bars were stale and very hard, had to throw them out!!!! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My toddler’s favorite food
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients, not great taste imo, but I hate dates, and blueberries... but my 15 month old loves them! He could eat the whole box in a day if I let him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: perfect for on the go breakfast. They are small but they taste very good. The blueberry muffin is the best flavor by far
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Larabars are awesome and the flavor of these is great. I've been eating them for years. The packaging this time was terrible. Bars were smashed up and box clearly damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Slay

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible in taste. I tried two. Forced them down. Just threw away the rest. I couldn’t stomach it. Didn’t taste like blueberry muffin at all.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great natural food bars
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars and the blueberry are no exception. Limited, natural ingredients make these the best snack bars I have found.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Only three ingredients:  blueberries, dates and cashews
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor and I also love that they don't have a lot of unpronounceable ingredients. They are whole 30 compliant, also.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Y

customer_reviews.title: They taste wonderful and are just the right size for a breakfast ...
customer_reviews.text: These bars are delicious and filling! They are sugar free, yet full of proteins and healthy fats--from dates and cashews. They taste wonderful and are just the right size for a breakfast replacement or a filling snack to tie you over until mealtime.
customer_reviews.author: KimM

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Bars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a fast, easy breakfast. They're just okay. I prefer a little sweeter bar.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the price for how many bars I got! I am stocked for a long time! This may be a good order if you or your family eats these non-stop! When they arrived, I did notice they were a little less fresh than I expected, but I think that just comes with shipping food from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: They have a great taste, healthy ingredients but just a tad expensive. Overall though very good.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Schutte

customer_reviews.title: Shocked
customer_reviews.text: Tastes JUST like a blueberry muffin. Also tried the Apple Pie one which was good as well. But the Blueberry Muffin flavor is on an entirely new level. Will buy these forever
customer_reviews.author: seattle96

customer_reviews.title: Great breakfast supplement
customer_reviews.text: Used to have these mainly as snacks, but I've recently switched to using them as breakfast replacements. 100% Natural, and sweet (but not too sweet) for someone who doesn't have time for a real breakfast. The bars are expensive, which is a major downside- but they're much better nutritionally then almost any other bar. Not for those watching calories or sugar- but definitely for those which shop natural.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Levy

customer_reviews.title: Stale sadly
customer_reviews.text: I always buy the same flavor in store so I know the texture and sadly these are dry and hard. Was hoping to contact seller but only saw options to send the whole thing back and I already threw out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Use Amazon Smile to donate

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these - since having to change my diet to adjust for multiple food allergies these are my go to snack to avoid low blood sugar - Spam is my other choice because it is also gluten and soy free. Great flavor and easy to store wone in the care and one in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Next time, I’ll order a different flavor!
customer_reviews.text: No at all as I expected. I should have bought one in the store before I ordered this many. No blueberry taste at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: The only flavor that contains extra (unwanted) elements
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars, and are used to them only listing nut and fruit as their ingredients. So caveat emptor - the Blueberry Muffin flavor also contains juice concentrates and vanilla extract, not listed on the Amazon description. These ingredients aren't unnatural or harmful, there are just some of us who can't eat extracts (because of the alcohol), or who might choose another flavor over this one because of the concentrates. So just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Stark

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabar and these blueberry muffin bars are a great new flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did Anyone at Larabar Taste Test This?
customer_reviews.text: Very weird chemical taste, nothing like blueberries. Teetering on inedible. Don't buy. The cherry pie, apple pie and chocolate versions are vastly better. The package is pretty, though. Wish I could eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: So far LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Tried Peanut Butter Cookie and Lemon Bar. LOVE!! Chewy and flavorful. Great alternative to granola bars with added sugar. Only dates and fruit used to sweeten these bars. The blueberry Muffin is maybe only a "3" for flavor. I cannot taste the blueberries, but the texture is still good.
customer_reviews.author: bargain mommy

customer_reviews.title: The only Lara Bar I really like is the Peanut Butter one
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find these very tasty. The only Lara Bar I really like is the Peanut Butter one. Flavorwise, I'd rather eat a hand full of nuts and berries or dried fruit, than the Blueberry Lara Bars. Lara Bars are extremely expensive so unless I love the taste, it's not worth the splurge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as good as some other flavors--prefer the cherry pie or apple pie
customer_reviews.text: I didn't love the flavor of this; doesn't have any of the natural sweetness of the blueberries--they are dried blueberries so were overly hard in the bar. The rest is the standard Lara Bar base, so that's as expected (dates & bits of cashews).
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Watch for the expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. They taste great and are healthy for you. When delivered on the 26th, I noticed that the expiration date says 10/31. Would appreciate fresh products please.
customer_reviews.author: Cntryhrt

customer_reviews.title: Contaminated by soap?
customer_reviews.text: I normally love this product but the last box I received smelled and tasted like it was contaminated with laundry soap or another heavily scented product. I was unable to eat this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: A textural adventure
customer_reviews.text: All of the Larabar Fruit & Nut Food Bars have generally the same texture - a soft, easily chewable bar with pieces of nuts in it. For a bar that's supposed to taste like a blueberry muffin, this is a bit jarring. I don't mind the flavor profile, however, it seems not the best match for this texture. It's not bad, but for my personal preferences, I will likely not order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I have food allergies and have to watch my wait, so it is hard to find products that satisfy both of these conditions. I like this product because it is all natural and tastes good without flaring up my allergies.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are yummy bara that are great for hiking, working out, or keeping in your car in case you get a little snacky!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Snack
customer_reviews.text: I first heard of this brand on The Biggest Loser tv show. They are made with all natural ingredients and don't contain any chemicals. A great mid morning or afternoon snack. Tastes great. My daughter wanted the blueberry muffin flavor. Very comparable price to our local store.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Soured
customer_reviews.text: Bars had a sour taste, like they were old or had been left in the sun. Ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: The Luth

customer_reviews.title: I really like Larabars but this flavor is not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I really like Larabars but this flavor is not my favorite. My husband didn't like them either. Of the kinds we've tried, we like Apple and Pecan Pie are our favorites respectively. We were doing a Whole30 so we have only tried the ones without added sugar.
customer_reviews.author: ClaraTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Relatively tasty and filling
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but arrived with box crushed, some bars melted and flattened.
customer_reviews.author: Paperpeople

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find these on Amazon Awesome tasting better than a Blueberry muffin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check your expiration date!
customer_reviews.text: Had to throw out. They were bad. Expiration date was 2 months past upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Keepin' it real!

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed in this brand
customer_reviews.text: Yum yum yum! Finally a bar I feel GOOD about feeding my children! I love them too.
customer_reviews.author: MrsCrawford

customer_reviews.title: My Kids LOVE These!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 4 year old love these bars; they are simply made and an easy on the go snack that doesn't crumble or make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Londerville

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite snack! Was looking for something that tasted good and wasn't chocolate! These worked!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Scribner

customer_reviews.title: These are so good
customer_reviews.text: These are so good it blows my mind. You also must try the banana bread one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!  I only wish they were organic though.
customer_reviews.text: These bars are really good. They only contain a few ingredients such as blueberries, blueberry juice, cashews, dates, etc. No preservatives, additional sugar, flavors, or sweeteners. They are non-GMO as well. I would have given them 5 stars if they were organic....but since they aren't I gave them 4. I still highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: My toddler has a milk allergy and doesn't get sweet snacks. These are perfect for him and he ...
customer_reviews.text: My toddler has a milk allergy and doesn't get sweet snacks. These are perfect for him and he loves them! Every morning he wants a "bar bar". We love all the variations in larabar flavors, but blueberry is our favorite. A nice alternative that doesn't contain gluten or milk allergens.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product I bought in the store, disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as product I purchased in the store. Disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Packaging snafu
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor but box was smashed upon receipt of the package - so some of the bars were misshaped/smushed.
customer_reviews.author: Mazoom1001

customer_reviews.title: Au natural nom nom.
customer_reviews.text: Best snack or quick meal for vegan, gluten free, sugar free...you know, natural stuff you are actually supposed to eat. Tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting bar with good unsaturated fats, protein and potassium
customer_reviews.text: I am always on the look out for great tasting nutritious food. My whole family including my 7 and 10 year old kids love these. It is a little big than your usual bars, but I eat it slowly or usually share it. You can actually enjoy the taste of the bar, which is a rare thing to say when talking about energy bars. Packs plenty of proteins and potassium for a great tasting bar.
customer_reviews.author: Sumanth K Kollipara

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: These bars are made from good ingredients and it tastes good too. Go Lara, you rock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: the flavor is good but they're dry. I don't think I'll order again.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Dream

customer_reviews.title: Expired Larabars
customer_reviews.text: The taste is bland. It needs more blueberry flavor. Plus, the expiration date was 01/11/2019, & I received this product on 01/10/2019. That’s really nice that you obviously don’t rotate your stock! Don’t you look at expiration dates?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Loved from the littlest to the biggest-the last one is always fought over.
customer_reviews.author: PCO Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were organic but otherwise they are tasty & I love the minimal ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Heyhey

customer_reviews.title: No sugar, all natural
customer_reviews.text: I cannot eat almonds and probably 75% of energy bars have almonds. This bar is a must for me. No additives, just real stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nut as good as other Larabars.
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars and have hooked my sister and her husband on them. I was disappointed with these compared to others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Harvey

product_meta.title: Larabar Gluten Free Bar, Blueberry Muffin, 1.6 Ounce (Pack of 16)
product_meta.description: Size:1.6 Ounce (Pack of 16)Larabar blueberry muffin gluten free, dairy free, soy free, non-gmo, vegan, kosher larabar real; no added sugar fair trade certified ingredients; delicious blend of unsweetened fruits, nuts and spices made from 100% whole food; each flavor contains no more than eight ingredients; uncooked and unprocessed retaining the essential enzymes
feature_bullets: This tasty snack bar is packed with gluten free blueberry muffin fruit and nut flavors
Made with no more than 9 ingredients and minimally processed
A delicious blend of unsweetened fruits, nuts, and spices for wholesome snack
Whole food snacks that are a real and simple treat; Perfect for busy, on-the-go moments

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
